titleStmt.title: The trimming of Thomas Nashe Gentleman, by the high-tituled patron Don Richardo de Medico campo, barber chirurgion to Trinitie Colledge in Cambridge
titleStmt.author: Harvey, Gabriel, 1550?-1631, attributed name.
Lichfield, Richard, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for Philip Scarlet,

notesStmt.note: Preface signed "Richard Lichfield" (i.e. Richardo de Medico campo); but unlikely to be by him. Also sometimes attributed to Gabriel Harvey.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
